  • Method Details

    • initialised

      boolean initialised()
      Has the Object Adapter been initialised?

    • run

      void run(ORB o, String name) throws org.omg.CORBA.SystemException
      run is a way of starting a server listening for invocations. For historical reasons we do this via the Object Adapter interface, though POA ORBs may implement this via the ORB.
      Throws:
      org.omg.CORBA.SystemException

    • run

      void run(ORB o) throws org.omg.CORBA.SystemException
      run is a way of starting a server listening for invocations. For historical reasons we do this via the Object Adapter interface, though POA ORBs may implement this via the ORB.
      Throws:
      org.omg.CORBA.SystemException

      Throws:

    • rootPoa

      void rootPoa(org.omg.PortableServer.POA thePOA) throws org.omg.CORBA.SystemException
